data.title: Re: Can't see fish in aquarium
data.meta_description: I am having fish disappear in my tanks. It says they're still there if I "Open" the tank... But they're invisible. It will only show them
data.text:
I am having fish disappear in my tanks. It says they're still there if I "Open" the tank... But they're invisible. It will only show them if I manually remove them from the tank then re-add them. They disappear any time I leave the lot.

No, I am *not* in laptop mode. I have the setting off as I'm in a pretty high powered desk PC. I'm able to run the game smoothly as far as graphics go with settings almost all the way up. Turning them down did not fix the problem.

Is anyone else having this specific problem?

I have already tried repairing my game files multiple times. I do have mods, but none that affect fish, pets or anything like that.

Product: The Sims 4

Platform:PC

Which language are you playing the game in? English

How often does the bug occur? Every time (100%)

What is your current game version number? 1.83.24.1030

What expansions, game packs, and stuff packs do you have installed? University, island living, get famous, seasons, cats and dogs, get together, get to work. Realm of magic, strangerville, jungle adventure, parenthood, vampires, dine out, outdoor retreat. Paranormal, laundry day, toddler, bowling night, backyard, kids room, romantic garden, movie hangout, spooky.

Steps: How can we find the bug ourselves? Place a fish in a fishtank or bowl and it is invisible. It says the fish is inside but it cannot be seen. It does not matter if it is caught or bought. Place a frog on any surface and you can only see a clear tank and the frogs eyes.

What happens when the bug occurs? Fish cannot be seen inside the fish tanks or bowls. Everything inside frog tanks is invisible except for the frogs eyes.

What do you expect to see? The fish in tanks and bowls and the entire frog should be visible.

Have you installed any customization with the game, e.g. Custom Content or Mods? Never used.

Did this issue appear after a specific patch or change you made to your system? Neutral/Not Sure

â€Œ

Fish and frogs are not visible in tanks
